text: Joanna Weale (born 1975) is a Welsh international lawn and indoor bowler. She won a bronze medal in the pairs with Anwen Butten at the 2002 Commonwealth Games in Manchester. She bowls for the Llandrindod Wells Bowling Club and is part of a famous Welsh bowling family. She is married to former Welsh national champion Brian Weale and is the sister-in-law to former national champions David, Stuart and Robert (a former World champion). ==References== Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Wales Category:Bowls players at the 2002 Commonwealth Games Category:Welsh female bowls players Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Joanna Weale
